text: The 1952 season was the Hawthorn Football Club's 28th season in the Victorian Football League and 51st overall. ==Fixture== ===Lightning Premiership=== The lightning premiership was played between rounds 5 and 6. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%; text-align:center; width: 100%; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto" ! rowspan="2"| Rd ! rowspan="2"| Date and local time ! rowspan="2"| Opponent ! colspan="3"| Scores (Hawthorn's scores indicated in bold) ! rowspan="2"| Venue ! rowspan="2"| Attendance |- ! Home ! Away !
